ReputationLevel.name: ReputationLevel
ReputationLevel.description: Represents a reputation level defined for an Experience Cloud site.

Label.description: The label for the reputation level.

LevelNumber.description: The rank of the reputation level.

ParentId.description: The ID of the parent Experience Cloud site the reputation level applies to.

Threshold.description: The lower limit of reputation points associated with this reputation level. The maximum number of reputation points a user can accrue is 999,999,999,999,999.
